english.segment1: I know there's hope in anger. And tenderness in shame. Sometimes I find you. On the other side of pain
english.segment2: But sometimes in the heat of day. When I close my eyes to pray. It seems like you are far from me. My prayers are all in vain
english.segment3: In my hour of hopelessness. In my deep despair. The noonday devil whispers in my ear
english.segment4: I know that you are with me. But I can't feel a thing. The noonday devil. Has come around again
english.segment5: Oh Lord, make me angry. Oh Lord, make me cry. Oh Lord, please don't leave me here. To fall into the devil's lies
english.segment6: Father, you have called me. To live a life that's true. That all my labors and my words. Would speak my love for you
english.segment7: But walking through this desert. Life is empty and mundane. The noonday devil. Has come around again
english.segment8: Oh Lord, make me angry. Oh Lord, make me cry. Oh Lord, please don't leave me here. To fall into the devil's lies
english.segment9: Oh Lord, make me angry. Oh Lord, make me cry. Oh Lord, break my cold, cold heart. So I can know your love inside. Your love inside.
